keywordsWithResponses.response: Ugh! Yes! They told me they didn't have my favorite type of toast! Unbelievable!!
Aggressive! How rude! Well, I can get a bit heated sometimes in arguments. But I was right!

dialogue.text: Sins? Who do you think you are?
Tsk, well let's get this over with quick, then!

evidence:
-----------------------------------
 Hell P.D. Report
-----------------------------------
Incident Description:
Ms. Barnes was shouting loudly, using profanity,
 and behaving aggressively towards the staff and
 other patrons. Her behavior disrupted the peaceful
 atmosphere of the establishment and caused alarm
 among the customers. Despite multiple warnings,
 Ms. Barnes persisted in her disorderly conduct,
 creating a hostile environment for all present.
Due to the severity of her behavior and the
 disruption caused, she was subsequently placed
 under arrest for disorderly conduct.
No one was harmed during the incident.

Brenda Barnes was noted down as an aggressive resident in [REDACTED]
